message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the problem of translating clinical jargon to layperson-understandable language, which is a natural language processing task. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses representation learning and statistical machine translation, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG and cs.AI). The paper also deals with information retrieval (cs.IR) as it aims to improve patient-clinician communication and clinical outcomes. Finally, the paper discusses the importance of reducing biases in clinical machine learning, which falls under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CY).
